articles.author: David Axe
articles.title: It May Be Too Late to Stop Monkeypox Becoming Endemic in the U.S. and Europe - The Daily Beast
articles.description: We failed to get on top of the monkeypox outbreak and we may have missed the chance to stop the disease becoming endemic—and a permanent threat—in the U.S. and Europe.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Jakarta Post
articles.title: WHO Europe expects more monkeypox-related deaths - The Jakarta Post - The Jakarta Post
articles.description: "With the continued spread of monkeypox in Europe, we will expect to see more deaths," Catherine Smallwood, Senior Emergency Officer at WHO Europe, said in a statement.
articles.content: The World Health Organization's European office said Saturday that more monkeypox-related deaths can be expected, following reports of the first fatalities outside Africa, while stressing that severe… [+2136 chars]

articles.title: New discovery of panda species which may have been Europe's last - EurekAlert
articles.description: Lumbering through the forested wetlands of Bulgaria around six million years ago, a new species of panda has been uncovered by scientists who state it is currently the last known and “most evolved” European giant panda.
articles.content:
image: Reconstruction of A. nikolovi sp. nov. from Bulgaria. Artwork by Velizar Simeonovski, Chicago.view more

articles.title: Determined Henrik Stenson 'extremely proud' after winning LIV Golf Invitational in New Jersey - ESPN
articles.description: Henrik Stenson's decision that cost him the European Ryder Cup captaincy paid large and immediate dividends Sunday when he won the LIV Golf Invitational event at the Bedminster course in New Jersey, picking up more than $4 million for three days' work.

articles.title: England win Women's Euro 2022 on home soil behind Chloe Kelly's scrappy extra-time goal against Germany - CBS Sports
